Package game

Class InputManager

java.lang.Object
game.InputManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener
public class InputManager extends Object implements KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener
The InputManager class is used to register key press, mouse movement, and mouse clicks and then store them for use in game.
